name: Psychic Force 2 / Psychic Force 2012
description:
The year is 2012.
Psychic Warriors rebel against a renegade psychic army in 360 degrees suspended fighting arenas. Warriors take control of wind, magic, lightning and the earth's elements in incredible 3-D battles with next-generation 128 bit anime graphics!
Psychic Force 2 is a Fighting video game published by Taito Corporation released on July 2nd, 1997 for the Sony PlayStation.
Psychic Force 2012 is a Fighting video game published by Acclaim, Taito Corporation released on October 31st, 1999 for the SEGA Dreamcast.
